body_html: Ohhh, thanks. immediate_child is very confusing since generally children are the submodules of the module, so "a child" is not a well-defined concept I'd say. How about adding recurse=False to (named_)parameters and (named_)buffers?
body_text: Ohhh, thanks. immediate_child is very confusing since generally children are the submodules of the module, so "a child" is not a well-defined concept I'd say. How about adding recurse=False to (named_)parameters and (named_)buffers?
body: Ohhh, thanks. `immediate_child` is very confusing since generally children are the submodules of the module, so "a child" is not a well-defined concept I'd say. How about adding `recurse=False` to `(named_)parameters` and `(named_)buffers`?
